Detailed Description

Defines a path. Allows for retrieving the vertices of the path.

Member Function Documentation

void AggOO::vs::path_vertices::render_shape_data ( const agg::trans_affine &  mtx,
std::vector< VectorShapeData > &  shapes 
) [inline]

"Render" the shapes to an array. The idea is to tessellate the curves so that the vertices will resemble the original shapes as much as possible.
